price: Na haya ni makumbusho yaliyo barikiwa, tuliyo yateremsha. Basi je! Mnayakataa?
arabic: وَهَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞ مُّبَارَكٌ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُۚ أَفَأَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ مُنكِرُونَ
footnotes: Na hii Qur'ani ni kumbusho, lenye kheri nyingi. Tumekuteremshieni kama tulivyo mteremshia Musa. Basi yawaje nyinyi muikatae, na hali nyinyi ndio mnao stahiki zaidi kuiamini kuliko watu wote!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahādhā dhik'run mubārakun anzalnāhu afa-antum lahu munkirūna
